text: Mesquite is a large city in north-central Texas. It is a part of a much larger group of cities called the Metroplex. Its population in 2020 was 150,108. == History == The city was founded on March 14, 1878. It was named after the Mesquite Creek. The city was officially created on December 3, 1887. == Other websites == * Category:Cities in Dallas County, Texas Category:1870s establishments in Texas Category:1878 establishments in the United States
title: Mesquite, Texas
